title: Intravenous application of human umbilical cord mesenchymal stem cells alleviate neuropathic pain by suppressing microglia activation in rats
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Xiaodong Xu, Hui Chen, Yubei Qiu, Ye Chen, Junle Liu, Bangwei Zeng, Lei Lin, Xinyan Lin, Leisheng Zhang, Liangcheng Zhang
